mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gate_user_intime ( login_name, name, sex, mobile, tel, address, email, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, status, version, password, default_organid, idd, org_id, org_name, tenant_code, cn, promotion_url_tent, promotion_url_hp, promotion_url_apple, role, performance_examination, user_img_url, mobilephone, pwd_sign, app_uid, ip_limit, need_captcha, is_white_list_user, is_enabled, update_state_time, update_state_user, update_is_enabled_time, update_is_enabled_user, password_expire_date, last_login_time, last_time_password, machine_limit, sys, system, kz_ticket, kz_user_id ) VALUES ( #{loginName}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{mobile}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{email}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{status}, #{version}, #{password}, #{defaultOrganid}, #{idd}, #{orgId}, #{orgName}, #{tenantCode}, #{cn}, #{promotionUrlTent}, #{promotionUrlHp}, #{promotionUrlApple}, #{role}, #{performanceExamination}, #{userImgUrl}, #{mobilephone}, #{pwdSign}, #{appUid}, #{ipLimit}, #{needCaptcha}, #{isWhiteListUser}, #{isEnabled}, #{updateStateTime}, #{updateStateUser}, #{updateIsEnabledTime}, #{updateIsEnabledUser}, #{passwordExpireDate}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastTimePassword}, #{machineLimit}, #{sys}, #{system}, #{kzTicket}, #{kzUserId} )

INSERT INTO gate_user_intime ( login_name, name, sex, mobile, tel, address, email, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, status, version, password, default_organid, idd, org_id, org_name, tenant_code, cn, promotion_url_tent, promotion_url_hp, promotion_url_apple, role, performance_examination, user_img_url, mobilephone, pwd_sign, app_uid, ip_limit, need_captcha, is_white_list_user, is_enabled, update_state_time, update_state_user, update_is_enabled_time, update_is_enabled_user, password_expire_date, last_login_time, last_time_password, machine_limit, sys, system, kz_ticket, kz_user_id ) VALUES
( #{item.loginName}, #{item.name}, #{item.sex}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.tel}, #{item.address}, #{item.email}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.updateUser}, #{item.status}, #{item.version}, #{item.password}, #{item.defaultOrganid}, #{item.idd}, #{item.orgId}, #{item.orgName}, #{item.tenantCode}, #{item.cn}, #{item.promotionUrlTent}, #{item.promotionUrlHp}, #{item.promotionUrlApple}, #{item.role}, #{item.performanceExamination}, #{item.userImgUrl}, #{item.mobilephone}, #{item.pwdSign}, #{item.appUid}, #{item.ipLimit}, #{item.needCaptcha}, #{item.isWhiteListUser}, #{item.isEnabled}, #{item.updateStateTime}, #{item.updateStateUser}, #{item.updateIsEnabledTime}, #{item.updateIsEnabledUser}, #{item.passwordExpireDate}, #{item.lastLoginTime}, #{item.lastTimePassword}, #{item.machineLimit}, #{item.sys}, #{item.system}, #{item.kzTicket}, #{item.kzUserId} )

mapper.update:
UPDATE gate_user_intime
login_name = #{loginName},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
mobile = #{mobile},
tel = #{tel},
address = #{address},
email = #{email},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
status = #{status},
version = #{version},
password = #{password},
default_organid = #{defaultOrganid},
idd = #{idd},
org_id = #{orgId},
org_name = #{orgName},
tenant_code = #{tenantCode},
cn = #{cn},
promotion_url_tent = #{promotionUrlTent},
promotion_url_hp = #{promotionUrlHp},
promotion_url_apple = #{promotionUrlApple},
role = #{role},
performance_examination = #{performanceExamination},
user_img_url = #{userImgUrl},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone},
pwd_sign = #{pwdSign},
app_uid = #{appUid},
ip_limit = #{ipLimit},
need_captcha = #{needCaptcha},
is_white_list_user = #{isWhiteListUser},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled},
update_state_time = #{updateStateTime},
update_state_user = #{updateStateUser},
update_is_enabled_time = #{updateIsEnabledTime},
update_is_enabled_user = #{updateIsEnabledUser},
password_expire_date = #{passwordExpireDate},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime},
last_time_password = #{lastTimePassword},
machine_limit = #{machineLimit},
sys = #{sys},
system = #{system},
kz_ticket = #{kzTicket},
kz_user_id = #{kzUserId},
WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT name, mobile FROM `gate_user_intime` WHERE mobile IS NOT NULL AND mobile != '';
